abilities.name: Fleet Commander
abilities.description: As an action may make an :average: Leadership check, all allies on 4 ships in the encounter may immediately suffer 1 Strain to perform one maneuver and Ackbar may spend :triumph: to allow 1 ally to suffer 1 Strain to perform one free action instead.

abilities.name: Concentrated Fire
abilities.description: As an action, make an :average: Leadership check. All allies on up to 4 ships in the encounter gain :advantage::advantage: on all Gunnery checks until the beginning of Ackbar’s next turn.

abilities.name: Confident Command
abilities.description: Upgrade difficulty of all combat checks against a ship this character is commanding once.

abilities.name: Zero-Gravity Maneuvers
abilities.description: In zero gravity, Alliance Fleet Troopers treat movement as being in normal terrain instead of difficult terrain.

abilities.name: Experience counts
abilities.description: Allies within Short range of Andor add :boost: to Stealth and Deception checks.

abilities.name: Whatever It Takes
abilities.description: Andor may spend a maneuver to add :success::advantage: to the next combat check made by a friendly character within Short range. That character suffers 3 Strain.

weapons.name: BlasTech A280-CFE blaster pistol
weapons.notes: Spend a maneuver to switch between modes.

abilities.name: Human-Cyborg Relations
abilities.description: While C-3PO is translating for a character, that character removes :setback::setback: from their Charm and Negotiation checks.

abilities.name: Improved Phrasing
abilities.description: C-3PO allows player within Short range to cancel :threat: or :despair: from their Charm and Negotiation checks. C-3PO then suffers 1 strain per cancelled :threat: and 4 strain per cancelled :despair:.

abilities.name: We’re Doomed!
abilities.description: C-3PO adds :setback: to the Discipline, Mechanics and Piloting checks any characters within Short range make.

abilities.name: Life Debt
abilities.description: Once per encounter, Chewbacca may spend 1 Destiny Point to reroll 1 skill check when defending or aiding Han Solo.

abilities.name: Master of Repairs
abilities.description: When Chewbacca repairs System Strain or Hull Trauma on a starship or vehicle, he repairs three additional System Strain or Hull Trauma.

abilities.name: The Wookiee Wins
abilities.description: Chewbacca may spend :triumph: from Brawl checks to inflict the Maimed Critical Injury.

abilities.name: Wookiee Roar
abilities.description: Once per encounter, as an Action Chewbacca may inflict 5 Strain on all enemies within medium Range.

weapons.name: Chewbacca’s bowcaster
weapons.notes: Spend a maneuver to load a specialised quarrel that adds either Blast 5, Breach 1, Concussive 1, Disorient 2, Ion or Vicious 4 to the next attack using bowcaster.

talents.name: Hold Together
talents.description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to, immediately after vehicle or starship takes damage, turn it into System Strain.

abilities.name: Impulsive Distraction
abilities.description: Once per encounter, Han may spend an Action to allow all allies in the encounter to add automatic :success: to their next skill check that round.

abilities.name: Never Tell Me The Odds
abilities.description: Once per session, after assembling the dice pool for a check but before rolling, Han may suffer up to 3 Strain to remove an equal amount of negative dice from the pool.

weapons.name: Han’s heavy blaster
weapons.notes: Once per round, as a maneuver Han may upgrade the difficulty of the next attack with this weapon once to gain Pierce 7 on that attack. GM may spend :despair: or :threat::threat: on the check to have it run out of ammo.

abilities.name: Takes Advantage
abilities.description: Jyn needs one fewer :advantage: to activate an item quality, to a minimum of one.

abilities.name: While They’re Down
abilities.description: Allies add :advantage::advantage: to Melee checks made against prone or disoriented targets engaged with Jyn.

name: K-2SO

abilities.name: Brutal Honesty
abilities.description: K-2SO adds :setback::setback: to allies’ social skill checks within Short range.

gear: Built-in comms package with communications booster

abilities.name: Idiot’s Array
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may turn :triumph: from another character’s skill check related to a game of chance into :despair:.

abilities.name: Prehensile Feet
abilities.description: Can move along vertical surfaces as if they were horizontal.

abilities.name: Honour Guard Training
abilities.description: When making a brawl of melee attack, Knockdown costs one less :advantage:.

weapons.name: Bo-rifle ranged
weapons.notes: Bo-rifle takes a maneuver to switch between profiles.

weapons.name: Bo-rifle melee
weapons.notes: Bo-rifle takes a maneuver to switch between profiles.

name: Leia Organa
description: The Alderaanian princess is already well known to be as out-spoken and politically savvy as her famous father. Although she is very young to hold a position of power as great as that of an Imperial Senator, she has had a lifetime of training for the role. She embodies all of Alderaan’s values and strengths, along with Bail Organa’s political skill and desire to bring an end to the Emperor and Empire. She actively users her diplomatic status to support resistance activities, whether for recruitment, acquisition of supplies, delivery of information, or even to personally join a fight when necessary.

abilities.name: Take Charge (Improved)
abilities.description: When making a skill check, Princess Leia may spend :advantage: to let one ally within Medium range immediately perform a maneuver as an out-of-turn Incidental. She may instead spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: to let all allies within Medium range perform a maneuver as an out-of-turn Incidental instead.

talents.name: Exhaust Port
talents.description: Before attacking a starship or vehicle, Luke may spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore the effects of the Massive rule for the attack.

abilities.name: One In A Million
abilities.description: Luke may spend 1 Destiny Point to add :success::success:, :advantage::advantage: or :success::advantage: to any combat check he makes.

name: Obi-Wan (Ben) Kenobi
description:
On Tatooine, Obi-Wan Kenobi is a lifetime away from his days as a Jedi Master. If he is known at all there, it is as the eccentric old hermit Ben. Of course, this is exactly how Kenobi wants it. He needs to be left alone to watch over Luke Skywalker and to spend time meditating and studying the Force.

His duty to train the boy as a Jedi has been blocked by Luke’s uncle, but he still protects young Skywalker from many threats.  Kenobi has also needed to defend himself as well from attack, especially from an outcast terror whom he thought defeated many years ago on Naboo. Other figures from his past may also rise again, but Kenobi has had many years to prepare and is ready to whatever it takes to see the Empire ended.

talents.name: Jedi Defender
talents.description: Once per encounter, after igniting his lightsaber, may spend 1 Destiny Point to make enemies within Short range unable to target any other foes except him until the end of his following turn.

abilities.name: Always Teaching
abilities.description: Once per session, each PC within Short range of Obi-Wan counts their Force rating as one higher until the end of the encounter.

abilities.name: Force Power: Terrifying Projection
abilities.description: Once per encounter as a maneuver, Obi-Wan may force each enemy within Medium range to make a :hard: fear check as an out-of-turn Incidental.

name: Politician
description: Denizens of the Core Worlds include former members of the Imperial Senate, recently disbanded by the Emperor, who remain in the area in hopes of maintaining their political influence, wealthy lifestyle, and general connection to the goings-on of the Empire as a whole. Under normal circumstances, these individuals venture into the more rural regions of the galaxy only very rarely. Even those who represent the Outer Rim Territories can scarcely find time for such a lengthy journey. When such individuals do venture out into the galaxy at large, it is typically to serve their own needs rather than the needs of anyone else. A rare few are genuinely interested in the fate of their constituents and seek to aid the Alliance in restoring a more compassionate government, but most have benefited far too much from their association with the Empire to willingly aid in its overthrow.

name: Senator
description: Denizens of the Core Worlds include former members of the Imperial Senate, recently disbanded by the Emperor, who remain in the area in hopes of maintaining their political influence, wealthy lifestyle, and general connection to the goings-on of the Empire as a whole. Under normal circumstances, these individuals venture into the more rural regions of the galaxy only very rarely. Even those who represent the Outer Rim Territories can scarcely find time for such a lengthy journey. When such individuals do venture out into the galaxy at large, it is typically to serve their own needs rather than the needs of anyone else. A rare few are genuinely interested in the fate of their constituents and seek to aid the Alliance in restoring a more compassionate government, but most have benefited far too much from their association with the Empire to willingly aid in its overthrow.

name: R2-D2

talents.name: Hidden Storage 1
talents.description: R2-D2's body contains a hidden compartment that can hide small objects totalling no more than Encumberance 1. Checks to detect this compartment are :formidable:.

abilities.name: Plucky Little Droid
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an Incidental, R2 may convert one dark side Destiny Point to a light side Destiny Point.

gear: Rocket boosters (allows R2-D2 to fly, as per the rules in the Flying sidebars in Chapter VI: Conflict and Combat in the core rulebooks)

talents.name: Brilliant Evasion
talents.description: Once per encounter, when piloting a vehicle or starship, may select 1 opponent and make an opposed Piloting (Planetary or Space) check. If successful, the opponent’s vehicle or starship cannot attack the character’s vehicle for 4 rounds.

abilities.name: Out of Nowhere
abilities.description: Once per session, Wedge may upgrade the ability of a Gunnery check he makes against an undamaged vehicle or starship twice; allies who make combat checks against the same target that round add automatic :advantage::advantage: to their checks.

talents.name: Calming Aura
talents.description: When an opponent targets Yoda with a Force power, reduce :forcepip: generated by 1.

abilities.name: Do or Do Not
abilities.description: Yoda allows allies within Short range to downgrade the difficulty of their skill checks once. They may suffer 2 strain to downgrade the difficulty twice instead.

abilities.name: Force Power: Farsight
abilities.description: Yoday may spend :forcepip: to ignore the effects of darkness or blindness and see normally up to extreme range for 3 rounds (or 3 minutes).

abilities.name: Strategic Direction
abilities.description: Once per round, Admiral Piett may spend a maneuver to direct three Imperial Navy NPCs or minion groups within Medium range (this can be at planetary scale for targets on other ships); each target may perform an immediate maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental or instead add :success: to their next check.

name: Darth Vader
description:
Many dark tales are told about a black-armoured humanoid who serves as the Emperor’s most trusted enforcer and is perhaps the most feared being in the Empire. Rumoured to live in a forbidding castle on a world of lava, this warrior wields a red lightsaber and possesses terrifying powers that suggest he has a connection to the dreaded Sith. The few who claim to have survived encounters with this individual are unsure whether the armour houses a living being, a combat droid, or even a clone trooper. Many even fear that duplicates could be activated if the first is ever defeated.

In addition to his other duties to the Empire, Darth Vader is believed to be the most senior member of the Inquisitorius, and legends abound of his pursuit of target after target when other agents failed in their efforts. It is possible that Vader has trained Inquisitors in the techniques required to eliminate Force-sensitive targets.
notes: Vader from Dawn of Rebellion does not have the added note to his lightsaber, nor does he have the helmet optics, or the integrated medsystems. These are for Allies and Adversaries Vader only. Gadgets and Gear adds Integrated Combat, Visage of Death and Peerless Armour, the Medical System, Enhanced Optics Suite.

abilities.name: Force Power: Force Choke
abilities.description: Darth Vader may spend :forcepip: to immobilise a target within Short range until the end of Vader’s next turn; may spend :forcepip: to inflict 1 Wound on the target, ignoring Soak and may do so multiple times. Vader may also roll an opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check against the target, if the check succeeds, the target suffers a Critical Injury, adding +10 to the roll per :forcepip: spent on the check.

abilities.name: Terrifying
abilities.description: At the beginning of each encounter, each enemy within Medium range must make a :hard-3: fear check.

abilities.name: Visage of Death
abilities.description: Once per encounter, after Darth Vader kills an Imperial character, he may spend a Destiny Point to add :success::advantage: to checks made by other Imperial characters in the current encounter for the remainder of the encounter.

abilities.name: Peerless Armour
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an out-of-turn incidental, the wearer of Darth Vader’s armour may spend a Destiny Point to increase the soak provided by this armour to +6 until the end of the wearer’s next turn.

abilities.name: I Have You Now
abilities.description: After inflicting a Critical Hit or Injury in combat, Vader may spend :advantage: to add +20 to Critical Hit or Injury roll results.

abilities.name: Integrated Combat
abilities.description: Whenever Vader makes a combat check with his lightsaber and generates a Critial Injury, he may also, as an incidental, activate one Force power he possesses as if he had spent :forcepip: equal to the severity of the Critial Injury.

weapons.name: Vader’s Lightsaber
weapons.notes: Once per encounter, when ignited upgrades the ability of a Coercion check Vader makes once.

gear: Enhanced Helmet Optics (cancels the effect of darkness, smoke or other environmental effects that obscure vision)
Enhanced Optics Suite (remove :setback::setback: from Perception, Vigilance and Combat checks due to environmental effects that obscure vision
Integrated Medical System (add :boost: to all Medicine checks to heal Vader, once per session, may activate this attachment as an incidental, this counts as using a stimpack)

talents.name: Terrify (Improved)
talents.description: Take the Terrify action; make an :average: Coercion check, adding :force: no greater than Force rating. Disorient one target within Medium range per :success:. Spend :advantage::advantage: to extend duration and :triumph: to stagger one target. Spend :darkside: to immobilise one target.

talents.name: Shien Technique
talents.description: When making a Lightsaber check, may use Cunning instead of Brawn.

abilities.name: Force Power: Unleash
abilities.description: Emperor Palpatine may make an Unleash power check as a ranged attack and roll an :average: Discipline check. If the check succeeds and Emperor Palpatine spends :darkside::darkside:, the attack hits with the profile of the Unleash weapon.

abilities.name: Force Power: Farsight
abilities.description: May spend :forcepip: to ignore the effects of darkness or blindness and see normally up to extreme range for 3 rounds (or 3 minutes).

abilities.name: Power of the Dark Side
abilities.description: When Palpatine inflicts Wounds on an opponent, Palpatine immediately recovers 3 Strain or 1 Wound.

weapons.name: Unleash
weapons.notes: May spend :darkside: to reduce the critical rating to 1; may spend :darkside: to affect up to two additional targets within range; may spend :darkside: to give the attack Ensare 2; may spend :darkside: to give the attack Burn 2.

talents.name: Field Commander (Improved)
talents.description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check. If he succeeds six minion groups may immediately suffer 1 Strain to perform one maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental. Spend :triumph: to allow one of those groups to perform an action instead.

abilities.name: Maximum Firepower
abilities.description: Once per encounter, General Veers may spend 1 Destiny Point to double the damage resulting from a Gunnery check from a single Imperial vehicle in the encounter and add +30 to any Critical injury or Critical Hit results inflicted on the target from the attack.

abilities.name: Armored Charge
abilities.description: May spend a maneuver to direct three Imperial Armour Corps members on allied armoured vehicles within Medium range to make an immediate maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Fire
abilities.description: May perform a maneuver to direct one Imperial Armoured Corps member within Medium range to perform an immediate out-of-turn incidental.

name: Imperial Navy Gunner
description: The common citizen of the galaxy will never see a Star Destroyer or a stormtrooper in person, if they are fortunate. For the majority of those who never leave a planet’s surface, the Imperial Army trooper is the face of the Empire. Stormtroopers and starships can be seen in promotional materials, but it is the stern and unforgiving face of the Army infantry that enforces the will of the Emperor on a planet’s surface. For that reason, it is the men and women of the Imperial Army whom Alliance personnel must combat.

abilities.name: Gun Battery
abilities.description: For each Imperial Navy Gunner in the minion group beyond the first, increase damage on a successful Gunnery check by 1.

name: Stormtrooper: Range Trooper
gear: Gription boots (removes :setback::setback: imposed on checks to maintain footing in unstable environments)
Range trooper armour (+1 Soak, when making skill checks, range troopers remove :setback::setback: imposed due to harsh environmental conditions

name: 4-LOM

abilities.name: Calculating Hunter
abilities.description: 4-LOM may use his Intellect when opposing Deception, Skulduggery, and Stealth checks that target him.

abilities.name: Integrated stun-gas emitter
abilities.description: Once per encounter, as an action may force all organics within Short range to make a :hard: Resilience check to resist stun gas. Those that fail suffer 3 Strain, plus 1 additional Strain per :threat:.

gear: Enhanced optics suite (cancels the effects of darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision

name: Black Krrsantan

abilities.name: Intimidating Presence
abilities.description: All allies within Short range of Black Krrsantan add automatic :success: to Coercion and Negotiation checks they make again enemies.

abilities.name: Pit Fighter
abilities.description: After making a Brawl or Melee check that inflicts a Critical Injury, Black Krrsantan may suffer 2 Strain to add +30 to the Critial roll result.

abilities.name: Strong Arguments
abilities.description: Black Krrsantan may use Brawn instead of Willpower when making Coercion checks.

gear: Armour and subdermal plating (+3 Soak, +2 Defence)

name: Boba Fett

abilities.name: Apex Hunter
abilities.description: Once per encounter, Boba Fett may reroll a combat or opposed check.

abilities.name: No Disintegrations
abilities.description: When Boba Fett makes a successful combat check, he may spend :advantage::advantage: to convert all damage he deals into Stun Damage.

gear: Mandalorian armour (+3 Soak, +2 Defence, integrated jet pack, can fly as per the flying sidebar in Chapter VI: Conflict and Combat)
Rangefinder (adds :advantage: on all ranged weapon attacks)
wearer may draw or stow one item per turn as an incidental

abilities.name: Deceptive Hunter
abilities.description: Allies within Short range of Bossk add automatic :success: to Deception checks they make against enemies.

weapons.name: Poison gas grenades
weapons.notes: Organic targets must make a :hard: resilience check or suffer 5 wounds plus 1 strain per :threat:; :despair: means they must resist again on their next turn.

name: Dengar

abilities.name: Brutal Hunter
abilities.description: If a target suffers Wounds from his attack, Dengar may suffer up to 3 Strain to inflict a number of additional Wounds equal to the amount of Strain suffered in this way.

abilities.name: Dirty Tricks
abilities.description: Once per encounter as an action, Dengar may make a :hard: Skulduggery check. If successful, he may select one enemy within Short range, plus one additional target per :success:, to suffer 4 Wounds. After resolving this, Dengar may perform a Move maneuver as an incidental.

abilities.name: Cantina Talk
abilities.description: When a character is within Short range of Dengar they may suffer 2 Strain to add automatic :advantage::advantage: to Streetwise and Knowledge: Underworld checks they make that turn.

gear: Modified heavy battle armour (+2 Soak, +1 Defence, built-in comlink

name: Doctor Aphra

abilities.name: Watch Out for the Traps!
abilities.description: Make a :hard: Vigilance check, if successful, all character within Short range suffer 2 Wounds plus 1 additional Wound per :failure:. GM May spend :despair: or :threat::threat::threat: to have targets who succeed become immobilised, disoriented or staggered.

abilities.name: Enormous Profit
abilities.description: Whenever PC’s working with Doctor Aphra would gain credits for an illicit reward or black market deal, one PC may make a :hard: Negotiation check. If they succeed, they gain double the expected credits. If they fail, they get the normal amount. If they fail with :despair:, they get nothing and she gets all the money.

gear: Modified HK heavy-duty lifter Ark Angel

abilities.name: Crafty Droid
abilities.description: May use Cunning instead of Brawn when making Brawl checks.

abilities.name: Hypo-Digits
abilities.description: As an action, may make a :hard: Skulduggery check against one target within Engaged range. If successful, the target suffers 10 Strain or the effects of another drug or poison at the GM’s discretion.

abilities.name: Expert Interrogator
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may make an opposed Medicine versus Discipline check against one restrained target. If successful, the target suffers 5 Wounds and the difficulty of Coercion checks made against the target is downgraded twice until the end of the session.

abilities.name: Concealed Armament
abilities.description: Detecting BT’s array of stowed weapons requires a scanner and a :daunting: Computers check. BT-1 can deploy or conceal his weapons as an incidental.

abilities.name: Homicidal Droid
abilities.description: Once per session as an action, make a :hard: gunnery check. If successful, eliminate one minion group within Medium range and may spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: to eliminate one other minion group or a single rival.

abilities.name: Smoke Emitters
abilities.description: As an action, may deploy smoke to create concealment that adds :setback::setback::setback: to checks within Short range as per Concealment rules in Chapter VI of any core rulebook.

name: IG-88

abilities.name: Advanced Omnidirectional Sensors
abilities.description: Cancels the effect of darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision.

abilities.name: Deadly Hunter
abilities.description: May spend a maneuver to add the Breach 1, Limited Ammo 1 and Vicious 3 qualities to his pulse cannon for its next use before the end of the current encounter.

gear: Combat chassis (+3 Soak, +2 Defence, integrated flamethrower)
Modified Trilon Agressor assault fighter IG-2000

name: Jabba the Hutt

abilities.name: Mind Trick Immunity
abilities.description: Jabba cannot be affected by Force powers involving mental manipulation.

abilities.name: Ponderous
abilities.description: Hutts can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

abilities.name: Danger Below
abilities.description: Once per encounter may make an opposed Deception versus Vigilance check to lure a target onto a trap set in the flooring. Success means the target falls in the trap and Jabba may spend a :triumph: to cause one additional enemy to fall in as well; if unsuccessful, the target may spend :despair: to cause an ally of Jabba to fall instead.

gear: Customized Ubrikkian Industries sail barge Khetanna
Modified Ubrikkian Minstrel-class space yacht Star Jewel

abilities.name: Hasty Repairs
abilities.description: When making a check to repair a weapon, equipment, vehicle or droid, may reduce the difficulty of the check one level to a minimum of :simple:. Checks involving the repaired object that generate :despair: inflict an immediate Critical Hit on the vehicle or a Critical Injury if it is a droid. If a character is using the item, this inflicts a Critical Injury on the character.

abilities.name: Home Turf
abilities.description: While in territory the gang controls, this character and members of their gang who are within Short range add automatic :advantage: to checks they make.

talents.name: Smooth Acceleration
talents.description: When performing the Punch It maneuver, the rider’s swoop bike suffers 1 less System Strain than normal, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Hidden Numbers
abilities.description: Tusken Raiders may spend :triumph::triumph: in a combat check to have a new minion group of three Tusken Raiders riding a bantha appear at long range from them. This group occupies a new Initiative order and acts in this round.

name: Zuckuss

abilities.name: Intuitive Hunter
abilities.description: As an action, may make an opposed Survival versus Stealth to gain information as to the whereabouts of his quarry; :triumph: may be spent to reveal the quarry’s exact location.

gear: Modified Byblos Drive Yards G-A transport Mist Hunter

abilities.name: Arboreal Ambush
abilities.description: Once per session while in a forested area, may spend :triumph: from an Initiative check to pick a single opposing minion group; that group may not act in the first round of combat.

name: Ewok Shaman

abilities.name: Spiritual Guidance
abilities.description: Once per session, as an action the shaman may make a :hard: Leadership check; if successful, all members of the shaman’s tribe within Short range add +1 to their Willpower for the remainder of the session.

abilities.name: Spiritual Leader
abilities.description: As an action, choose up to 3 Ewok minion groups at Short range; affected targets may make an immediate Move maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental and upgrade the ability of their next skill check once.

gear: Heavy leather mantel and ritual headdress (+1 Soak)

abilities.name: Fearsome Roar
abilities.description: As an action, the krayt dragon may force a target within Medium range to make a :formidable-3: fear check; may spend :threat::threat: to immobilise the target and :despair: to stagger the target.

abilities.name: Krayt Venom
abilities.description: May spend :advantage::advantage: on a successful melee attack to have the target suffer 3 Wounds and 3 Strain due to poison; when the krayt dragon is the target of a Brawl attack, may spend :despair: or :threat::threat::threat: to have the attacker suffer 3 Wounds and 3 Strain due to the poison.

abilities.name: Cranial Weakness
abilities.description: A character within Short range from the krayt dragon who makes a combat check targeting the dragon that inflicts wounds may spend :triumph::triumph: to inflict a Critical Injury with +80 to the critical roll.

weapons.name: Teeth and claws
weapons.notes: Tail swipe. May spend :advantage: on successful combat check to hit one additional opponent within range that would be no more difficult to hit than the original target.

abilities.name: Travel Between Worlds
abilities.description: As an action, a Loth-wolf can travel on a planetary scale between any two wilderness locations on Lothal. The Loth-wolf crosses between the two points in a matter of minutes, regardless of actual distance, and may carry one character of Silhouette 1 or less with them.

name: Mouse Droid
gear: Built-in repair tools (counts as a tool kit and an emergency repair kit that can be used once per session)

abilities.name: Drawn In
abilities.description: Characters ensnared by a sarlacc add :setback::setback: to their checks to break free. If they fail or do not attempt the check, at the end of their turn they are pulled one range band closer to the sarlaccs maw. Should they end their turn at Engaged range of the sarlacc, they are swallowed alive and are immobilised until released. Should the sarlacc suffer a :hard: or worse Critical injury, or be killed, it immediately releases all captives.

abilities.name: Digestive Toxins
abilities.description: While swallowed, a character is exposed to a corrosive acid of rating 1 (see Chapter VI: Conflict and Combat of any core rulebook).
